name: DESCENT: GOTY EDITION
description:
A game about going to heck! This is an expansion / update for my game "Descend", originally released in 2016, improving on the core mechanics as well as adding a couple new features.

Credits:

@itlungylung - Sprites, sound effects, coding
@pmeledees193 - Music, testing 

You can also get the OST on their Bandcamp and Soundcloud.

Controls:

Arrow keys, WASD - Move
It's also got gamepad support.
